name: UIVisualEffectView
desc: An object that implements some complex visual effects.

items.name: init(effect: UIVisualEffect?)
items.desc: Creates a new visual effect view with the designated visual effect.

items.name: var contentView: UIView
items.desc: A UIView object that can have a visual effect view added to it.

items.name: var effect: UIVisualEffect?
items.desc: The visual effect provided by the view.
